title: Noir
synopsis: On a sunny afternoon in her Paris apartment, assassin-for-hire Mireille Bouquet receives a strange email from Kirika Yuumura, a young student from Japan, inviting her to "make a pilgrimage to the past" together. Initially thinking the email is nonsense, she changes her mind when it begins playing a song that she recognizes from her youth.
voices: ['Kuwashima, Houko', 'Mitsuishi, Kotono', 'Hisakawa, Aya', 'Tarako', 'Touma, Yumi', 'Oosaka, Fumiko', 'Seki, Toshihiko', 'Ootsuka, Houchuu', 'Kamiya, Hiroshi']
